Dexter Vines bụ onye America na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na inker, nke a maara maka mmekorita ya na ndị na-ede akwụkwọ dịka Steve McNiven na Ed McGuiness, onye nke ikpeazụ n'ime ha bụ ndị otu "eDex".
Vines arụọla ọrụ n'ọtụtụ aha ihe nkiri maka Marvel na DC
Ụfọdụ utu aha gụnyere Marvel's big 2007 summer event Civil War, Tangent Comics Power Girl, Superman / Batman, JLA Classified (ha niile na McGuiness), na Wolverine.
N'afọ 2012, Vines natara ihe nrite 2012 Inkwell Award for Favorite Small Press And Mainstream-Independent (S.P.A.M.I.) ink work over another pencil artist.
